dict.string: Earth's Mightiest Heroes joined forces to take on threats that were too big for any one hero to tackle. With a roster that has included Captain America, Iron Man, Ant-Man, Hulk, Thor, Wasp and dozens more over the years, the Avengers have come to be regarded as Earth's No. 1 team.
Black Panther,Black Widow,Capitan America,Captain Marvel,Falcon,Hank Pym,Hawkeye,Hulk,Iron Man,Luke Cage,Quicksilver,ScarletWitch,Sider-Woman,Thor,Vision,Wasp,Wonder Man
A group of cosmic adventurers led by Star-Lord, the Guardians of the Galaxy protect the universe from threats all across space. The team also includes Drax, Gamora, Groot and Rocket Raccoon!
Feared and hated by humans because they're different, the X-Men are heroic mutants, individuals born with special powers who've sworn to use their gifts to protect mutants as well as humans.
